metrics.name: postgresql_active_time
metrics.description: This metric indicates the total active time of PostgreSQL, reflecting the duration of database activity.

metrics.name: postgresql_blk_read_time
metrics.description: This metric indicates the total time spent by PostgreSQL reading blocks from the disk.

metrics.name: postgresql_blk_write_time
metrics.description: This metric indicates the total time spent by PostgreSQL writing blocks to the disk.

metrics.name: postgresql_blks_hit
metrics.description: This metric indicates the number of times PostgreSQL queries hit the cache, reflecting cache efficiency.

metrics.name: postgresql_blks_read
metrics.description: This metric indicates the number of blocks read by PostgreSQL from the disk.

metrics.name: postgresql_buffers_alloc
metrics.description: This metric indicates the number of buffer blocks allocated by PostgreSQL to monitor memory usage.

metrics.name: postgresql_buffers_checkpoint
metrics.description: This metric indicates the number of buffer blocks written during checkpoints in PostgreSQL.

metrics.name: postgresql_xact_commit
metrics.description: This metric indicates the total number of transactions committed by PostgreSQL, reflecting the workload of the database.

metrics.name: postgresql_xact_rollback
metrics.description: This metric indicates the total number of transaction rollbacks performed by PostgreSQL.

metrics.name: postgresql_sessions
metrics.description: This metric indicates the total number of sessions created by PostgreSQL, reflecting database connection activity.

metrics.name: postgresql_sessions_abandoned
metrics.description: This metric indicates the count of sessions abandoned due to prolonged inactivity.

metrics.name: postgresql_sessions_killed
metrics.description: This metric indicates the total number of sessions terminated by an administrator or system.
